message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  Based on its potential to generate significant returns, I've determined a fair asking price of $1200000. This price reflects the inherent value of the product while also providing you with a substantial margin for profit. I'm confident that this is a win-win scenario, allowing you to secure a high-impact asset while ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.
